channel.title: WiFi adapter is it recommended?
channel.description:
Situation: Using Qubes-whinox and public WiFi not an home WiFi which helps because on an home WiFi the isp can easily track me down if my opsec is comprised
Is using an WiFi adapter helpful in my situation? Please note seeking as much anonymity as possible I just don’t know if this has benefits
If it is helpful, how can the WiFi adapter itself be anonymize?

item.title: WiFi adapter is it recommended?
